faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Buying a Flat For Sale in Sector 65 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get answers to the most common queries regarding property purchase legality infrastructure and financing options in this emerging residential hub.

faqs.question: What are the common sizes and configurations of flats available in Sector 65
faqs.answer: Sector 65 offers a wide variety of flat configurations to suit different family sizes and budget requirements. Typically you can find Studio 1 BHK 2 BHK 3 BHK and 4 BHK units. The sizes generally range from compact 500 sq ft for studios up to large 2500 sq ft for premium 4 BHK and penthouse units. We specialize in matching buyers with the exact size and layout that meets their specific needs for comfort and accessibility.

faqs.question: Is Sector 65 considered a good investment location for property appreciation
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 65 is currently identified as a high-potential investment zone within Gurugram. Its strategic location near the KMP Expressway robust planned infrastructure and proximity to industrial and commercial centers are key drivers of future capital appreciation. Investing now before the planned infrastructure is fully realized offers the best opportunity for maximum returns on a Flat For Sale in sector_65.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 2 BHK Flat For Sale in sector_65
faqs.answer: The price range for a standard 2 BHK flat in Sector 65 can vary significantly based on the builder project age specific amenities offered and the floor level. Generally prices start from approximately ₹45 Lakhs and can go up to ₹75 Lakhs for premium projects. We advise consulting our property experts for the most current and specific pricing based on your desired project and specifications.

faqs.question: Are the Flat For Sale in sector_65 properties RERA registered and verified
faqs.answer: We prioritize legal compliance and transparency. All new and most established residential projects listed on our platform are RERA registered. This ensures that the developer follows strict guidelines regarding construction quality delivery timelines and financial disclosures providing immense security to the buyer. We always verify RERA certificates before listing any Flat For Sale in sector_65.

faqs.question: What kind of water and power supply infrastructure is available in Sector 65
faqs.answer: Sector 65 benefits from reliable civic infrastructure managed by the local authorities and dedicated society management. Most residential complexes offer 24/7 power backup facilities ensuring continuity during planned or unplanned outages. Water supply is typically managed through both municipal lines and internal borewell systems ensuring adequate water availability throughout the year.

faqs.question: What are the home loan options and required down payment for buying a flat here
faqs.answer: Leading public and private sector banks offer excellent home loan facilities for buying a Flat For Sale in sector_65. Buyers can typically secure loans covering up to 80% or sometimes 90% of the property value depending on their eligibility and income criteria. A down payment of 10% to 20% of the total flat cost is generally required at the time of booking or agreement execution.

faqs.question: How far is Sector 65 Gurugram from the nearest Metro station and major commercial hubs
faqs.answer: While Sector 65 is developing excellent road connectivity the nearest operational Metro stations like Bata Chowk or Escorts Mujesar are accessible within a 15-20 minute drive. Furthermore the sector is very close to emerging commercial and industrial sectors along the KMP Expressway reducing the commute time significantly for those working in the Gurugram-Palwal industrial belt.

faqs.question: What are the typical monthly maintenance charges for flats in this sector
faqs.answer: Maintenance charges vary based on the society’s amenities and the size of the flat. For a typical 2 BHK or 3 BHK unit charges usually range from ₹2500 to ₹5000 per month. This fee typically covers security services common area lighting elevator maintenance garbage disposal gym access and general upkeep of the residential complex premises.

faqs.question: Is there adequate social infrastructure like schools and hospitals nearby Sector 65
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 65 benefits from excellent proximity to established social infrastructure. Reputed schools like DPS or Modern School are within a 10-15 minute drive. For healthcare quality hospitals and multi-specialty clinics are also easily accessible ensuring families have access to top-tier educational and medical facilities readily.

faqs.question: Can NRIs buy a Flat For Sale in sector_65 easily and what documents are required
faqs.answer: Yes Non-Resident Indians can easily purchase residential property in Sector 65 Gurugram subject to FEMA regulations. The process involves securing necessary clearances using NRO or NRE accounts for transactions. Required documents typically include passport OCI/PIO card proof of current address and specific bank statements demonstrating the source of funds.
